SELECT tb.light_id, light.location, tb.temperature, tb.humidity, tb.wind_speed FROM( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY light_id ORDER BY create_time DESC) AS rn FROM sensor ) AS tb,light
WHERE tb.light_id=light.id and rn=1
SELECT DATE(sensor.create_time) AS day, AVG(sensor.temperature) AS temp, AVG(sensor.humidity) AS humi, AVG(sensor.wind_speed) as windspeed FROM sensor GROUP BY day ORDER BY day
